    Supplier of schemas for topics

    • Method Detail

      • getKeySchema

        TopicSchemaSupplier.SchemaResult getKeySchema(java.lang.String topicName,
                                              java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> schemaId,
                                              FormatInfo expectedFormat,
                                              SerdeFeatures serdeFeatures)
        Get the key schema for the supplied topicName.
        Parameters:
        topicName - the name of the topic.
        schemaId - optional schema id to retrieve.
        expectedFormat - the expected format of the schema.
        serdeFeatures - serde features associated with the request.
        Returns:
        the schema and id or an error message should the schema not be present or compatible.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - on communication issues with remote services.

      • getValueSchema

        TopicSchemaSupplier.SchemaResult getValueSchema(java.lang.String topicName,
                                                java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> schemaId,
                                                FormatInfo expectedFormat,
                                                SerdeFeatures serdeFeatures)
        Get the value schema for the supplied topicName.
        Parameters:
        topicName - the name of the topic.
        schemaId - optional schema id to retrieve.
        expectedFormat - the expected format of the schema.
        serdeFeatures - serde features associated with the request.
        Returns:
        the schema and id or an error message should the schema not be present or compatible.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - on communication issues with remote services.
